import React from "react"; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar.js'; import Footer from '../components/Footer.js'; import { Button } from "shards-react"; export default class AssetPool extends React.Component { render() { return (

Interest Asset Pool

Join the pool and vote on which Crypto Asset the Consortium will use to purchase.

Pooled DIA

The CAC pooled DIA earns interest through the Compound protocol for 2 weeks. At the end of 2 weeks the interest earned is automatically withdrawn through the CAC protocol.

Asset Nomination

CAC members nominate assets to be purchased. Nominations include a resale price and timeframe. After 2 days the nomination with the most votes will be set for purchase.

Acquisition

Through the CAC protocol the asset is acquired and immeiately put up for auction.A

Asset Auction

Asset are auction off on OpenSea marketplace. Once the sale is complete the proceeds are dispersed to CAC members.

); } }
